'''The Crane Soars Skyward''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.4]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-01-31 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2024-02-20 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Xianyun}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Gaming;Faruzan;Noelle}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* After this event wish ends, the 4-star character {{Wish Item|Gaming}} will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in the next Version.
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
